description: Test utility functions for React components, including rendering with context providers, setting URL hash, and clearing local storage for tests.

methods.name: renderWithProviders(ui, { withAuth = true, withFavorites = true } = {})
methods.description: Render a React component wrapped with Favorites and Auth context providers for testing, with options to include or omit each provider.

methods.name: setHash(path)
methods.description: Set the window location hash to a specified path and dispatch a hashchange event, useful for testing hash-based routing.

methods.name: clearLocalStorage()
methods.description: Clear the browser's localStorage, ignoring errors if any occur, for test setup.

ctags.name: renderWithProviders
ctags.pattern: /^export function renderWithProviders(ui, { withAuth = true, withFavorites = true } = {}) {$/
